messages.help: Availalbe commands include: | tts: send a tts message || about: info about the channel || help: list commands and their use || shoutout: shoutout a user || rules: display the rules || discord: display the discord message || soundboard: plays sounds on stream |
messages.about: Hello, welcome to my stream. I stream things for reasons. lets all have a good time.
messages.shoutout: Hey {u}, thanks you're awesome. But not as awesome as ducks.
messages.rules: #1 No foxes, #2 No discrimination (unless its against foxes), #3 UwU, Ara ara
messages.raid: Thank you {u} for raiding with {n} people
